## `takeWhile`

Calls the shouldContinue function for each Push event of the given source. The returned source will emit an End event instead of the received Push event when the given shouldContinue function returns a falsy value.

### Signature

<pre>function takeWhile&lt;T, S extends T&gt;(shouldContinue: (value: T, index: number) =&gt; value is S): <a href="../operator.md#operator">Operator</a>&lt;T, S&gt;;</pre>



### Signature

<pre>function takeWhile&lt;T&gt;(shouldContinue: (value: T, index: number) =&gt; unknown): <a href="../operator.md#operator">Operator</a>&lt;T, T&gt;;</pre>
